problems.title: Inverted Right-Angled Triangle
problems.description:
Write a program to print an inverted right-angled triangle pattern of stars of height n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*****
****
***
**
*

Explanation:
An inverted triangle of height 5 is printed.
hintsList: Outer loop decreases from n to 1.
